titles: Protogenes can know Apelles by his line though he se him not and wise men can consider by the penn the aucthoritie of the writer thoughe they know him not. ...
author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.
notes: A reply to: Gosson, Stephen.  The schoole of abuse.
Title from opening words of text.
Printer's name conjectured and publication date supplied by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
